content: Water collector sys DD-WCS-500 V ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Self-attaching water collectors- - ### FEATURES:Features No need for additional holders to fix the water collector to the wall Catches up to 80% of slurry Applications Keep the jobsite clean with the WMS 100 water management system Multiple collection rings available based on core bit diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector systems For use with: DD-WMS 100 Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector systems | For use with | DD-WMS 100 ### ITEMS- 2215477 - Water collector sys DD-WCS-500 V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x WCS 500-V Water collector sys assy
